section.title: Annotated Term Format
section.para: ATerms (Annotated Terms) are the values of Stratego. The ATerm format provides a set of construct for representing trees, comparable to XML or abstract data types in functional programming languages. In Stratego, an ATerm (from now just called term) usually is the abstract syntax tree of some source code.
